rows.label: tlk45700111_02_msg0001
rows.name:
I've been in the salvaging
business twenty years now. Let
me give you a bit of advice.

rows.label: tlk45700111_02_msg0002
rows.name:
The area you salvage in'll
determine what you find.

rows.label: tlk45700111_02_msg0003
rows.name:
And you'll find that some places are
harder to salvage in than others.

rows.label: tlk45700111_02_msg0004
rows.name:
If you can't find what you're looking
for in one place, try elsewhere.

rows.label: tlk45700111_02_msg0005
rows.name:
Say I can't find something here up
on the Salvage Deck. I'll just head
over to the Uzushio instead.

rows.label: tlk45700111_02_msg0006
rows.name:
Oh, and one more thing. Don't
be surprised if monsters end
up coming after you.

rows.label: tlk45700111_02_msg0007
rows.name:
Sometimes you've gotta make a stand
against the critters of the Cloud Sea
if you want to get the good stuff.
